channel.title: [508] Out of bounds exception help
channel.description:
This is the error I received whilst trying to connect to DavidScape V7.0 Source, on my own computer, using a standard 508 IP changer client.
Any ideas?
Error: Class68_Sub13_Sub15:259 Login:254 client:790 Applet_Sub1:485 Applet_Sub1: 156 Thread:619 | java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 0 error_game_crash Shutdown complete - clean:true
